description: to support operations, internal clients, development projects and Change Requests as necessary for NRCan.
full_summary:
# **Notice of Proposed Procurement**
## **Reference Information**

* **ITB Number:** PW-22-01017975
* **Solicitation Number:** 5000070953
* **Publication Date:** 2022-12-20
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-09T14:00:00

## **Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Service)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** The contract is subject to the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA) and other international trade agreements.

## **Contract Description**

Natural Resources Canada is seeking Informatics Professional Services to support operations, internal clients, development projects, and Change Requests as necessary. The CIOSB is undertaking a series of large projects and workload migration initiatives that will require a significant increase in resources.

## **Contracting Entity Information**

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Natural Resources Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E4, Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Ray Thai (Designated Contact)
	+ raymond.thai@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca

## **Notice Documents**

* The tender description and notice document are available for download from the CanadaBuys website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/20/967c5f5223091b977375820c6400fa5d/npp_tbips_nrcan-5000070953_en.pdf (English)
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/20/eefa97e480a33740bd6b1d86901a2cfb/spict_apm_rncan-5000070953_fr.pdf (French)

## **Notice Status**

The notice has expired. Respondents interested in submitting a proposal should have done so by the closing date and time specified above. Objections or protests related to the notice and any subsequent award must be addressed in writing within 10 days of the issuance of the award.  [1]  [2]

Note: [1] Remarking official websites for further details, [2] Specific regulations and guidelines apply to this process, please consult the provided links for accurate details. 

This is a notice of proposed procurement by the government
